pages.text: The birthday_cake Strain$(br2)Base THC: 23% $(br)Base CBD: 2% $(br)Effect: Oozing
birthday_cake Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
birthday_cake Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
birthday_cake Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting birthday_cake Weed in an Extractor
You can package your birthday_cake weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
